DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Websites nutrition education may effective method help people eat fruit vegetable may lower risk cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized trial study well internet-based nutrition education program work prevent cancer participant health maintenance organization .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Based Nutrition Education Program Preventing Cancer Participants Health Maintenance Organizations
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Compare effect internet-based nutrition education untailored website vs tailor website ( TW ) v TW tailor human online behavioral interaction ( HOBI ) change number daily fruit vegetable serving consume participant health maintenance organization . Secondary - Compare proportion participant report consumption 5 serving fruit vegetable per day 3-month interval . - Compare change fruit vegetable serving consume baseline intermediate time point . - Compare effect intervention observation time participant . - Determine effect HOBI participant . - Compare impact participant characteristic , term effect intervention change fruit vegetable intake , participant . OUTLINE : This randomize , control , single-blind , multicenter study . Participants stratify accord participate site , gender , participant 's stage change readiness . Participants randomize 1 3 intervention arm . - Arm I ( untailored website ) : Participants give unlimited access internet-based nutrition education program 6 month . They provide 4 serial educational website 1 , 3 , 13 , 15 week initial login . These internet site provide general information fruit vegetable , new recipe emphasis fruit vegetable , participant incorporate diet . Participants complete online survey 3 month . - Arm II ( tailor website ) : Participants give unlimited access internet-based nutrition education program 6 month . They provide 4 serial educational website , timepoints arm I , emphasis vegetable consumption week 1 13 fruit consumption week 3 15 . Materials website , include new recipe emphasis fruit vegetable , tailor revise ( retailored ) base individual health-risk information obtain baseline 3-month online survey . - Arm III ( tailor websites human online behavioral interaction [ HOBI ] ) : Participants give unlimited access internet-based nutrition education program 6 month . Participants provide 4 serial educational website tailor material arm II . They also receive HOBI ( tailor e-mail message ) develop revise base health-risk information obtain baseline 3-month online survey . In arm , participant complete online survey 3 , 6 , 12 month measure fruit vegetable intake change long-term risk behavior . For survey , participant receive 6 automatically generate reminder e-mails 1 mailed announcement . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 2,619 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Current member follow participate health maintenance organization : Group Health Cooperative Kaiser Permanente , Colorado Kaiser Permanante , Georgia HealthPartners Research Foundation Henry Ford Health System/Health Alliance Plan Must complete webbased health survey prior randomization PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No medical mental health condition would adversely affect increase vegetable fruit intake One participant allow per household PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No concurrent anticoagulation therapy ( e.g. , warfarin ) No concurrent medication would adversely affect increase vegetable fruit intake No grapefruit concurrently follow medication : Statin high cholesterol Blood pressure medication ( e.g. , Losartan ) Calcium channel blocker Certain psychiatric medication ( e.g. , buspirone hydrochloride , triazolam [ Halcion ] , carbamazepine , diazepam [ Valium ] , midazolam hydrochloride ) Immune suppressant ( e.g. , cyclosporine tacrolimus ) Impotence medication ( e.g. , sildenafil [ Viagra ] ) Methadone
DOC.keyword: unspecified adult solid tumor , protocol specific
